title: How to Make a Double Band Fishtail Loom Bracelet

steps.title: Get two bands (color #1 & color #2).
steps.content: Get two bands (color #1 & color #2). Twist the two bands into an infinity symbol and place onto two pegs.

steps.title: Place color #3 & color #1 on top of the two pegs.
steps.content: Place color #3 & color #1 on top of the two pegs. Keep these two bands untwisted.

steps.title: Put color #2 and color #3 above the other four bands.
steps.content: Put color #2 and color #3 above the other four bands.

steps.title: Pull the bottom two bands on the left side up and over the peg.
steps.content: Pull the bottom two bands on the left side up and over the peg. Repeat process on the right side.

steps.title: Pull the bottom two bands over the pegs on each side.
steps.content: Pull the bottom two bands over the pegs on each side.

steps.title: Repeat the process until bracelet is at desired length.
steps.content: Repeat the process until bracelet is at desired length. Continue the pattern while doing so. Make sure that the bracelet can fit around your wrist.

steps.title: Pull the bottom two bands over the pegs again.
steps.content: Pull the bottom two bands over the pegs again.

steps.title: Pull the other two bands over the pegs.
steps.content: Pull the other two bands over the pegs. You should now have two bands on each side.

steps.title: Pull the last two bands on the left side over the peg.
steps.content: Pull the last two bands on the left side over the peg. Place a C or S clip on it. Repeat on the right side.
